children.text: tayā sa pūtaś ca vibhūṣitaś ca
yeṣāṃ na cetāṃsi ta eva dhīrāḥ
avaimi te sāram ataḥ khalu tvāṃ
vyarthaṃ samarthya lalitaṃ vapur ātmanaś ca
pratikūlaṃ na ca te mayā kṛtam
smara saṃsmṛtya na śāntir asti me
tava tac cāru vapur na dṛśyate
kṣaṇam apy utsahate na māṃ vinā
itthaṃ rateḥ kim api bhūtam adṛśyarūpaṃ
tapaḥ kva vatse kva ca tāvakaṃ vapuḥ
mṛdu prakṛtyā ca sasāram eva ca
parā hi kāṣṭhā tapasas tayā punaḥ
na rūpam ity avyabhicāri tad vacaḥ
tathā na gāṅgaiḥ salilair divaś cyutaiḥ
tapaḥphalaṃ syāt kim ataḥ paraṃ vada
na dṛśyate tac ca kṛśodari tvayi
na ratnam anviṣyati mṛgyate hi tat
manas tu me saṃśayam eva gāhate
varaṃ tam icchāmi ca sādhu veditum
na jātu bālā labhate sma nirvṛtiṃ
na vetsi bhāvastham imaṃ janaṃ katham
kadā cid ete yadi yogam arhataḥ
tad asti kiṃ vyastam api trilocane
kva tadvidhas tvaṃ kva ca puṇyalakṣaṇā
na vetsi nūnaṃ yata evam āttha mām
nivāryatām āli kim apy ayaṃ baṭuḥ
śṛṇoti tasmād api yaḥ sa pāpabhāk
kleśaḥ phalena hi punar navatāṃ vidhatte
vibhum api taṃ yad amī spṛśanti bhāvāḥ
ity ucyate tābhir umā sma namrā
vedhās tayos tāv api dhātur ādyau
pūrvaṃ mahimnā sa hi tasya dūram
yā dāsyam apy asya labheta nārī
yad rataṃ ca sadayaṃ priyasya tat
śatam agamad ṛtūnāṃ sāgram ekā niśeva
